file viewer.description: Allows apps to read file data

display.description: This app wants to edit rendering settings

notifications.description: Allows an app to send notifications

rmail.description: Allows an app to read, send and view your rmails

rvoice.description: Allows an app to send voice call requests

windows.description: Allows an app to view open windows

extensions.description: Allows an app to view running origin extensions

simulate inputs.description: (Careful) This app wants to use your keyboard

global variables.description: (Careful) This app wants to edit global data

account.description: (Careful) This app wants to edit your account

permission editor.description: (Careful) This app wants to edit permissions

file editor.description: (Careful) This app wants to edit all files

file admin.description: (Careful) Gives full access to the file system

start run.description: (Careful) This app wants to run when you log in

terminal.description: (Careful) This allows an app full system access

camera.description: (Careful) This app wants to use your camera

screen record.description: (Careful) This app wants to see your screen

save admin.description: (Careful) This lets the app edit all save data

weather.description: (Careful) This app could find your location

rotur token.description: (CAREFUL) GIVES COMPLETE ACCESS TO YOUR ACCOUNT
